Normal usage¶

  • hello world
  • hello world2
  • hello world3
  • hello world
  • hello world2
  • hello world3
<ul id="tab-items">
    <li>hello world</li>
    <li>hello world2</li>
    <li>hello world3</li>
</ul>

<ul id="tab-contents">
    <li>hello world</li>
    <li>hello world2</li>
    <li>hello world3</li>
</ul>
seajs.use('tabber/0.0.1/index', function(Tabber) {
    new Tabber({
        tabs:'#tab-items>li',
        panels:'#tab-contents>li',
        tabActiveIndex:2,
        triggerType:'mouseover'
    });
});
